seoTitle: Lip Butter Balm - Summer Fridays | Sephora
seoMetaDescription: Shop Summer Fridays’ Lip Butter Balm at Sephora. This silky vegan lip balm hydrates and soothes parched lips in seconds.

currentSku.productName: Lip Butter Balm for Hydration & Shine

skuImages.altText: Summer Fridays Lip Butter Balm for Hydration & Shine in Vanilla - sheer clear

productDetails.displayName: Lip Butter Balm for Hydration & Shine

brand.description: When you work this hard but still want soft, healthy-looking skin, @marianna_hewitt and @laurengores have got your back—and your beauty routine. We’re product connoisseurs who battle our own dull, tired, stressed-out complexions (hello, NYC-LAX red-eye) and set out to create skincare formulas with good-for-you ingredients and covetable results. Relieving stressed-out skin so everyday feels like a Summer Friday.
brand.longDescription: When you work this hard but still want soft, healthy-looking skin, @marianna_hewitt and @laurengores have got your back—and your beauty routine. We’re product connoisseurs who battle our own dull, tired, stressed-out complexions (hello, NYC-LAX red-eye) and set out to create skincare formulas with good-for-you ingredients and covetable results. Relieving stressed-out skin so everyday feels like a Summer Friday.

productDetails.heroImageAltText: Summer Fridays Lip Butter Balm for Hydration & Shine
productDetails.imageAltText: Summer Fridays - Lip Butter Balm for Hydration & Shine
productDetails.longDescription:
What it is: A silky vegan balm that hydrates and soothes dry lips in seconds.


Skincare Concerns: Dryness and Dullness


Highlighted Ingredients:

- Shea and Murumuru Seed Butters: Natural moisturizers that soothe, relieve, and condition parched lips.

- Vegan Waxes: Soften and boost shine all day with a smooth, never-greasy texture.


Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.


What Else You Need to Know: This formula delivers soothing moisture to parched lips in seconds. Butter up on the go for a quick hit of moisture and shine—or apply at bedtime as a nourishing overnight mask.


Clinical Results: In an independent clinical study, with 39 participants aged 20 - 55:

-92% showed a significant improvement in clinically measured* moisturization, immediately after application.


in an independent consumer use study, with 39 participants aged 20 - 55, immediately after application:

-97% agreed their lips felt softer

-97% agreed their lips felt hydrated

-92% agreed their lips looked less flaky

-100% agreed their lips looked healthier


Flavor Descriptions:

· Vanilla - sheer clear

· Sweet Mint - sheer clear

· Vanilla Beige - sheer beige

· Brown Sugar - sheer nude

· Poppy - sheer citrus coral

· Pink Sugar - sheer light pink

· Cherry - sheer cherry red

· Iced Coffee - A hint of iced coffee flavor and a sheen of cocoa color

· Hot Cocoa - sheer warm chocolate



This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.



CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.


This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.
productDetails.shortDescription:
What it is: A silky vegan balm that hydrates and soothes dry lips in seconds.


Skincare Concerns: Dryness and Dullness


Highlighted Ingredients:

- Shea and Murumuru Seed Butters: Natural moisturizers that soothe, relieve, and condition parched lips.

- Vegan Waxes: Soften and boost shine all day with a smooth, never-greasy texture.
productDetails.suggestedUsage:
Suggested Usage:
-Use when your lips need extra hydration throughout the day—or as an overnight mask.

Recycling Instructions:
-Upon unboxing, flatten the unit carton and liner and place in the recycling bin.
-Once you’ve finished the balm, remove and discard the cap and then recycle the plastic tube.

schemas.name: P455936 PK vid
schemas.description: A silky vegan balm that hydrates and soothes dry lips in seconds.

schemas.name: Lip Butter Balm for Hydration & Shine
schemas.description: Shop Summer Fridays’ Lip Butter Balm at Sephora. This silky vegan lip balm hydrates and soothes parched lips in seconds.

itemReviewed.name: Lip Butter Balm for Hydration & Shine

reviews.name: Unpleasant taste, great moisture!!!!
reviews.description: This lip balm tastes slightly soapy which is a big downside for me, and I was shocked by reviews raving about the scent. I can't smell anything at all! The texture is very smooth, luscious, and moisturizing, which made the taste worth enduring. Will be reordering in a different flavor!

itemReviewed.name: Lip Butter Balm for Hydration & Shine

reviews.name: amazing
reviews.description: super cute something i would wear going out or to a bar or a party or if i just felt like i wanted a cute pink tint on my lips definitely recommend

itemReviewed.name: Lip Butter Balm for Hydration & Shine

reviews.name: I love this product!!
reviews.description: I love this product so much! I love the texture and feel of the balm. The smell is not overpowering and that was something I was afraid of. My lips feel hydrated and smooth when I have this product on! Will repurchase again!

itemReviewed.name: Lip Butter Balm for Hydration & Shine

reviews.description: Love the shine, and taste of the balm, the hydration however leaves much to be desired. I feel like I have to constantly reapply. For me, the Ole Henriksen lip treatment is much better!

itemReviewed.name: Lip Butter Balm for Hydration & Shine

reviews.description: I have tried countless of lip balms in the past, but none have captured my heart quite like this products. As someone with perpetually dry lips, I'm always on the hunt for something that I'll provide long-lasting hydration. This balm delivers and the vanilla shade is just the icing on the cake! I am so in love!

itemReviewed.name: Lip Butter Balm for Hydration & Shine

reviews.name: Lip. Game. Changed
reviews.description: I have tried countless of lip balms in the past, but none have captured my heart quite like this products. As someone with perpetually dry lips, I'm always on the hunt for something that I'll provide long-lasting hydration. This balm delivers and the vanilla beige shade is just the icing on the cake! I am so in love!

itemReviewed.name: Lip Butter Balm for Hydration & Shine

reviews.name: i love this so much i cary it with me everywhere!
reviews.description: i love this product it makes my lips feel so hydrated and glossy, it’s not too sticky but it still has a good consistency and it doesn’t dry out my lips like some other glosses, it makes me feel pretty and put together and the applicator is my favorite i’ve ever used!!!!!

itemReviewed.name: Lip Butter Balm for Hydration & Shine

reviews.name: MUST HAVE!!
reviews.description: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!!! i bought it about a year ago and its over half full. its the the best smelling lip product ever. its the best vanilla scent.

itemReviewed.name: Lip Butter Balm for Hydration & Shine

reviews.name: Love
reviews.description: Please this is SO AMAZING this product lasted me a YEAR 😣 genuinely is the best lip product on the market it smells amazing hydrates your lips and lasts forever

itemReviewed.name: Lip Butter Balm for Hydration & Shine

reviews.description: A great product but lots of money!! Makes your lip shine
